comment.author: 61614891@N06
comment._content: One of my earliest commuter airline shots outside San Diego and it is still one of my favorite recollections.  This plane came into FAT with a pretty good load, and left with the same.  The only ground employee was a young lady who sold the tickets, collected the luggage, took it out to the plane, met the plane and helped passengers off, helped unload and load the baggage, led the departing passengers to the plane, and then waved the pilot off.  The all-purpose ground employee!
